summary: WHEN I BACKED OUT OF MY GARAGE AND TURN MY WHEEL HARD TO THE LEFT TO ENTER THE STEER FROM MY DRIVE WAY I HEAR A LOUD CLICKING NOISE. I TOOK IT TO HUMMER AND THEY SAID IT WILL COST 1500 - 2000 DOLLARS TO REPAIR OUT OF POCKET. THEY SAID IT WAS A SUBFRAME SUPPORT STRUCTURE THAT WAS ERODED.  *TR
